summary: A collection of pytest test suites that verify the correctness and robustness of the MSS library's utility modules, including data handling, authentication, configuration, geometric calculations, indexing, migration, file loading, dictionary behavior, netCDF4 processing, Qt interactions, thermodynamic conversions, time parsing, unit conversion, and version compliance.
business_intent: Provide automated regression testing to guarantee reliable functionality of core utility components, facilitating continuous integration, early detection of bugs, and confidence in library updates.
